welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Cheshunt, known for its quaint streets, beautiful parks, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private jet passengers, offering exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to VIP and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Luton Airport is used for VIP and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a variety of shops, restaurants, and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newly renovated terminal with state-of-the-art facilities and a wide selection of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A bustling terminal with a mix of international and domestic flights, featuring a range of services and amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A compact terminal with a focus on efficiency and convenience, offering a range of shops and dining options for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, featuring a modern design and a wide range of amenities including luxury shopping and dining options.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with options for premium access at an additional cost.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
